data.content:
Động từ
trụng nước sôi
you blanch almonds to remove their skin
anh ta trụng quả hạnh vào nước sôi để bóc vỏ
(+ with, at) tái mặt (vì sợ, lạnh…)
he blanched with fear at the sight of the snake
anh ta [sợ] tái mặt khi nhìn thấy con rắn

verb
blanches; blanched; blanching
[+ obj] :to put (food items) in boiling water or steam for a short time
Blanch the potatoes before slicing them.
a cup of blanched almonds
[no obj] :to suddenly have less color in your face because you are afraid, embarrassed, etc.
She blanched and remained silent when the store owner accused her of taking the money. - often used figuratively
Military leaders blanched at the thought of being asked to accept further funding cuts. [=they reacted in a way that showed they did not want to accept further cuts]
